item.title: flexdashboard
item.description: How to create a flexdashboar using Rstudio First weâ€™ll import libraries needed . library(devtools) library(dplyr) # For data manipulation library(ggplot2) # For our graphs library(Lahman) library(knitr) library(flexdashboard) In the menu bar click, File - New File - R Markdown - From Template -Flexdashboard starting with flexdashboard You will be presented with a file similar to this starting with flexdashboard And you can insert your code chunks as you wish.
